pros: By far the best company I have worked for. Administration is transparent and accessible. Customer service and patient care is emphasized. Great atmosphere and teamwork. Opportunities available to develop and grow. They are an independent health network and you can tell, you are not just a number like other larger health networks around.
cons: Do not have any cons to share.

review_title: The job requires inventory management, hiring, firing, and setting employee schedules.
pros: I enjoyed my coworkers and the benefits associated with the job. For the most part, the benefits were very good. They also had a nice facility.
cons: The job ended up becoming boring after a few years. It was more like punishment to do the same dull tasks repeatedly. My boss was respectful, but I didn't feel appreciated.

pros: Excellent company, very caring for it's employees.
cons: I have no cons, worked there for 7 years and loved every minute.
